methods.name: create

args.name: txnMBRDeposit
args.desc: The deposit of native token to cover MBR. This deposit is returned to creator on withdrawal or rescue operation

args.name: rescueDelay
args.desc: The number seconds from the current time after the tx can be canceled

args.name: secretHash
args.desc: Hash of the secret in keccak256

args.name: taker
args.desc: Creator of the escrow can set taker address. If taker address is set, with secret the funds can be routed only to this address. If the taker is zero address, anyone who claims with correct password, will receive the assets

methods.desc: Creates the escrow. The deposit tx funds the escrow and creates HTLC to release the funds with password any time (withdraw method). After the time anyone can call cancel method.

methods.name: makeHash
methods.desc: Return hash of the secret. Readonly method using the simulate method is for free.

methods.name: getMBRDepositAmount
methods.desc: Returns the amount to be deposited

methods.name: withdraw

args.name: secretHash
args.desc: Hash of the secret in keccak256

methods.desc: Withdraw from escrow with known password

methods.name: cancel

args.name: secretHash
args.desc: Hash of the secret in keccak256

methods.desc: After the time has passed, anyone can call this method to return funds to the original sender of the escrow account

methods.name: setTaker

args.name: secretHash
args.desc: Hash of the secret in keccak256

methods.desc: When destination setter is set, the destination setter can set the address of end user who receive the funds

methods.name: optInToToken
methods.desc: Anyone can optin this contract to his ASA if he deposits MBR

methods.name: adminWithdrawable
methods.desc: Shows the current withdrawable amount for the admin

methods.name: adminWithdraw
methods.desc: Method to exctract excess assets from smart contract address by the admin

methods.name: sendOnlineKeyRegistration
methods.desc: Creator can perfom key registration for this escrow contract, so that he can receive staking rewards
